sources.title: Killers of the Sea
sources.description: Captain Wallace Caswell, Jr. became famous for killing various dangerous animals of the sea by hand. This documentary shows him killing a Tiger shark, an octopus and giant sea turtles.

metadata.Plot: A film about Captain Wallace Caswell Jr. who does all in his power to protect game fish from illegal fishing and natural predators such as sharks, octopi and whales.
metadata.Writer: Adrian Johnson, John P. Medbury, Lowell Thomas
metadata.Actors: Lowell Thomas, Wallace Caswell Jr., 'Evolution' Henderson
